detail_desc: Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastic at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with visible seams, a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves and side pockets. Asymmetric hem with a raw, roll edge. No fasteners.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Blouse in an airy cotton and linen weave with embroidery on the front, short sleeves and slits in the sides of the hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with reversible sequins, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with reversible sequins, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.
Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.

Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave containing some wool with narrow notch lapels in imitation leather. Chest pocket, welt front pockets with an imitation leather trim, and two inner pockets. One button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband, an opening for the heels, and anti-slip protectors on the bottom of the feet.

Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband, an opening for the heels, and anti-slip protectors on the bottom of the feet.

Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband, an opening for the heels, and anti-slip protectors on the bottom of the feet.

Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband, an opening for the heels, and anti-slip protectors on the bottom of the feet.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable, lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Shoulder bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with one handle at the top and a detachable metal chain shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Flap with a sparkly stone detail and magnetic fastener, an inner compartment with an open pocket, and an imitation suede lining. Size 8.5x14x22 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of dungarees in soft cotton. Top in patterned jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Dungarees in a crêpe weave with a double frill at the front, elasticated straps, a concealed press-stud at one side and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 4-12M.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck and buttons down the front.
Pyjamas with a jersey top and flannel bottoms. Top with a flannel front pocket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Small backpack in imitation leather with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Lined. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Small backpack in imitation leather with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Lined. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Short lace dress with a small frilled collar and short, flounced sleeves. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.

Dress in mesh with sequined embroidery, pin-tucks at the top, buttons at the back and short butterfly sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt in a double layer of tulle. Satin lining.

Dress in mesh with sequined embroidery, pin-tucks at the top, buttons at the back and short butterfly sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt in a double layer of tulle. Satin lining.

Short wrap dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck at the front and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long trumpet sleeves. Lined.
Glittery Alice band with a rainbow, sunburst and cloud on top.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers. Striped, long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers in cotton jersey with a fly and button, decorative side pockets and a back pocket.
Jacket in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft knit. Size 28x180 cm.
Scarf in a soft knit. Size 28x180 cm.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on the top and a ribbed hem.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on the top and a ribbed hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned slub cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.

Top in patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, ties at the sides, and 3/4-length sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and a decorative bow at the waist, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and a decorative bow at the waist, and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in lace with an opening and button at the back of the neck, gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist and a scalloped hem. Jersey lining.

Soft slippers in faux fur with embroidery and appliqués. Anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back.
Necklace in metal with faceted plastic stones. Length approx. 45-52 cm.

Set with a short-sleeved top, long-sleeved cardigan, pair of leggings and a hairband in soft jersey. Top with an all-over print, short puff sleeves and a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Cardigan with buttons down the front and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Hairband with a sewn-on bow.
Airy, pattern-weave blouse with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a frill at the back. Long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with a frill trim.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Round-necked blouse in airy crinkled jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck, balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an overlocked hem.
